name: Alpha2 Alphanumeric Unicode Mixedcase Encoder
author: pusscat <pusscat@metasploit.com>
skylined <skylined@edup.tudelft.nl>
description:
Encodes payload as unicode-safe mixedcase text.  This encoder uses
        SkyLined's Alpha2 encoding suite.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: BufferRegister
options.description: The register that points to the encoded payload

options.name: BufferOffset
options.description: The offset to the buffer from the start of the register

options.name: AllowWin32SEH
options.description: Use SEH to determine the address of the stub (Windows only)
